lg.l: kalpātikalpāṃtikrūrakālabhrukuṭikuṭilatākalpakalpāgramuṣṭiḥkalpāṣṭiḥ krudhyatkālīkaṭākṣāṅkita ivakrudhyatkālīkaṭākṣāṅkita[sa]krudhyatkālīkaṭākṣāṃkita sukrukṣāṃkita iva kalayan kāntimkala........nimkalatimkala...nimkalayan kāṃnimkalayat kāntim ekāntakālīme(ṣe)kāntakālīekāṃtakālī |

krīḍaty asyākrameṇakrīyākrameṇa krīḍety asyākrameṇa krakacakṛtikṛtīkacakṛtikṛtī kumbhikumbhāgrakunti(mbhi)kumbhāgrakuṃbhikuṃbhāṃgrakuṃtikuṃbhāgrakruṃbhikuṃbhāgrakūṭakruṭakūṭaḥ kroḍeṣūtkṛttakaṇṭhotthitakroḍeṣūtkaṃtthitakroḍe pūtkṛttakaṃṭhotthitakroḍe phutkṛttakaṇṭhojjhitarudhirakaṇākīrṇakoṇaḥ kṛpāṇaḥkṛpā || 1 ||
As if adorned by its crossguard, curved like the contracted brow of cruel Kāla at the end of time,
it assumes an absolute black splendour, as if branded by a sidelong glance from a sulking Kālī.
Master at hacking straight down the middle of the crest between elephants’ temples,
his sword — edge splattered with blood gushing from severed throats — plays.

khaṃ preṅkhadbhiḥ kharāṃśoḥ prakharakharaśikhāḥ khaṇḍayan svair mayūkhaiḥ
khelāsaṃkhyeṣu khañjīkṛtaraṇarasikaḥ saṃmukhānāṃ khanitram |

khyātaḥ saukhyasya khāniḥ khalu kamitṛjuṣāṃ khecarīṇām akharvaḥ
khelaty utkhātakhaḍgapratiyuvasu khanatkāravān asya khaḍgaḥ || 2 ||
Shattering the impossibly hot flames of the sun with its rays swinging across the sky,
it is the maimer of battle connoisseurs in the pleasures that are the conflicts. It is the shovel for the enemies.
It is a celebrated mine of happiness, crucial for the celestial nymphs devoted to their lovers.
By making a clanging sound, his sword plays upon the rival youngsters (male prostitutes) of unsheathed/smashed swords.

gāḍhaṃ gātrasya guptigrahaṇam avagaṇayyāgrataḥ svargamārgaṃ
grasyann asya grahāgresarakaraguṇitodagrajāgradgabhastiḥ |

garvogragranthigotragrahilaripugaṇagrāsabhaṅgīgṛhīto
garjaty agresarāgryagrahagilanaguruḥ saṃgare maṇḍalāgraḥ || 3 ||
ghrāṇaṃ saṃgrāmalakṣmyā ghanasṛtiyaśasām aṅghrirujgho mahārghasyopaghnaḥ sāhasasyālaghuhṛdayalaghur bhītyaghaughasya vighnaḥ |

ghoṭaḥ kīrter ghanābhāpaghanagajaghaṭāghātanair ghṛṇyanighno
ghūrṇaty ujgharmaghṛṣṭiprakaraghṛṇisamāghrātighoro 'sya khaḍgaḥ || 4 ||

caṇḍaś caṇḍīśacakṣuś cirabhṛtaviṣamārcidhvajāc cānubhāle
caṇḍyāś cāmīkarābhe 'ñjanacayakhacitaṃ citrakaṃ kauryacañcuḥ |

citraṃ svācāntavīrāsur api ravirucā cumbitaś cākacikyāc
cakṣuḥkarmāṇi cūṣaty acirarucirucāṃ vañcako 'syāsir uccaiḥ || 5 ||

chāyāvāñchānurūpocchalitaripuśucau chādanaṃ kṛcchravṛṣṭau
chāyāvāhāśanes tacchalasamitilasacchauryakālālipuccham |

chātacchāttripravīraḥ chiduragaṇacaṇaś chekahṛcchokakārī
chāyākāntacchavīcchāvyatikaravaśato mūrcchatīddho 'sya khaḍgaḥ || 6 ||

div.p: ...vittaś chiduragaṇacaṇaḥ | "tena vittaḥ-" iti caṇap | chekānāṃ nāgarāṇāṃ hṛcchokakārī ||

lg.l:
jaṅghālo jaitrajanyājirabhuvi janayañ jantujāte jvarārtiṃ
jīvātur bāhujasya trijagati jayino dorbhujaṅgasya jihvā |

jyājānir vyāgrajāgradgajaradanaśilābhañjanājasrayogyo
jātajvālo jaṭāvān iha jayati jagajjitvaro 'muṣya khaḍgaḥ || 7 ||

div.p: jam iti || amuṣya khaḍga iha loke jayati | kiṃvidhaḥ | jaitraṃ jayaśīlaṃ yaj janyaṃ saṃgrāmas tasyājirabhuvi jaṅghālaḥ | satvara ity arthaḥ || "jaṅghālo 'tijave" ity amaraḥ | jantujāte prāṇimātre jvarārti jvarapīḍāṃ janayan | trijagati trailokye jayinaḥ parākramavato bāhujasya kṣattriyasya jīvātur jīvanauṣadham | "jīvātur jīvanauṣadham" ity amaraḥ | punaḥ kiṃvidhaḥ | athavā trijagati jayino dorbhujaṅgasya bāhusarpasya jihvā | jyājānir vasudhājāniḥ || "jāyāyā niṅ" | "vasudhāmaurvyor jyā" iti medinī | vyāgrāś ca jāgradgajaradanāś ca śilāś ca tāsāṃ bhañjanaṃ tatrājasraṃ yogyaḥ | jātā jvālā yasmin sa tathā | ata eva jaṭāvān | jagajjitvaraḥ ||

lg.l:
jhātkārāñ jaitrajanye jhagiti janayato janmikarṇajvarārtiṃ
jhañjhāvātānukārāñjhaṇajhaṇitijhaṇatkāriṇaḥ projjihānaḥ |

jhāṣāṅkīṃ tām avasthāṃ jhagiti ripujanaṃ grāhayan dhūrjaṭīṣṭāṃ
jhūrannamrāhiteṣūjjhitaraṇarabhasaṃ projjihīte 'sya khaḍgaḥ || 8 ||

div.p: jhād iti || asya khaḍga ujjhitaraṇarabhasaṃ saṃprās tādaraṃ yathātathā projjihīte gacchati | kiṃvidhaḥ | jaitrajanye jayaśīle saṃgrāme jhagiti jhātkārān anukaraṇaśabdān projjihānaḥ | kṛtavān ity arthaḥ | "ohāṅ gatau" | kiṃvidhāñ jhātkārān | jhañjhāvātānukārān suvṛṣṭikavātasadṛśān | punaḥ kiṃvidhān | jhaṇajhaṇitijhaṇatkāriṇaḥ | kiṃkurvan san | tāṃ prasiddhāṃ jhāṣāṅkīṃ mānmathīm avasthām | bhasmarūpām ity arthaḥ | ripujanaṃ vairilokaṃ jhagiti śīghraṃ grāhayan | kiṃvidhām avasthām | dhūrjaṭeḥ śaṃbhor iṣṭām | namrā ye 'hitās teṣu jhūraṃl lajjan |

lg.l:
ṭaṃkāroddhaṭṭitā yā jhaṭiti vighaṭayan koṭiśaś cāpayaṣṭīṣ
ṭaṅko vidviḍgirīṇāṃ karaṭikaṭakaṭāhātikuṭṭāgrakoṭiḥ |

duṣkūṭair yaṣṭikūṭaiḥ kuṭukuṭilasaṭaiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ koṭisaṃkhyaiḥ
kheṭair durghāṭavāṭān pratibhaṭasubhaṭāṃṣ ṭīkate 'muṣya khaḍgaḥ || 9 ||

div.p: ṭam iti || amuṣya khaḍgaḥ pratibhaṭasubhaṭān pratipakṣavīrān drāk śīghraṃ ṭīkate | tān prati gacchatīty arthaḥ | kiṃvidhaḥ | ṭaṃkāreṇa śabdenoddhaṭṭitāḥ prakaṭitāḥ yāḥ koṭiśo 'saṃkhyāś cāpayaṣṭīr jhaṭiti śīghraṃ vighaṭayan | punaḥ kiṃvidhaḥ | vidviṣāṃ girayas teṣāṃ ṭaṅko vidārakaḥ | punaḥ | karaṭino gajās teṣāṃ kaṭā gaṇḍasthalāni ta eva kaṭāhās tailādipākapātrāṇi teṣāṃ kuṭṭā piṣṭīkaraṇasamarthāgrakoṭir yasyeti | kiṃvidhān pratibhaṭasubhaṭān | duṣkūṭair duṣṭāgrair yaṣṭikūṭair yaṣṭisamūhaiḥ kaṭukuṭilasaṭaiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ phalakair durghāṭo vāṭo mārgo yeṣāṃ te | koṭisaṃkhyair iti viśeṣaṇaṃ triṣv api yojyam ||

lg.l:
ṭhātkārī kaṇṭhasīmany atikaṭhinatare skandhapīṭhe kaṭhore
pṛṣṭhāṣṭhīlānukāre śaṭhakamaṭhapateḥ kumbhapṛṣṭhe 'pi caibhe |
drāgdrāghiṣṭhaḥ kaṭhoracchavijaraṭhataradyotasaṃghaṭṭamūrchatkoṣṭhāḥ kāṣṭhāḥ prakurvan ripuśirasi luṭhaty etadīyaḥ kuṭhāraḥ || 10 ||

div.p: ṭhātkārīti || etadīyaḥ kuṭhāro ripuśirasi drāk śīghraṃ luṭhati | kiṃvidhaḥ | aibhe hastisaṃbandhini kaṇṭhasīmani kaṇṭhasamīpadeśe ṭhātkārī śabdakartā | kiṃvidhe kaṇṭhasīmani | atikaṭhinatare | punaḥ kiṃvidhaḥ | kaṭhore skandhapīṭhe ṭhātkārī | punaḥ kiṃvidhaḥ | aibhe kumbhapṛṣṭhe ṭhātkārī | kiṃvidhe kumbhapṛṣṭhe | śaṭhakamaṭhapater dhūrtakacchapasya | "śaṭho dhattūrake dhūrte madhyasthapuruṣe 'lase" iti mahīpaḥ | pṛṣṭhāṣṭhīlānukāre pṛṣṭhasyāṣṭhīlaṃ tattulye | drāghiṣṭho dīrghaḥ | kaṭhoracchaviḥ sūryas tasya jaraṭhataro yo dyotaḥ prakāśas tasya saṃghaṭṭas tena mūrchat dviguṇībhavan | "jakṣityādayaḥ ṣaṭ" iti num na | kiṃ kurvan san | kāṣṭhā diśaḥ koṣṭhāḥ svādhīnāḥ prakurvan san | "koṣṭhaḥ kusūle cātmīye madhye kukṣer gṛhasya ca" iti medinī ||

lg.l: ḍimbho daṇḍāyudhasya pradhanaghanataḍiccaṇḍadoḥ kuṇḍalīndrakṣveḍaḥ proddaṇḍadarpadviradananigaḍo ḍiṇḍimaḥ śauryabhartuḥ |
asya prācaṇḍyabhāṇḍaṃ dhṛtamadhupagaladgaṇḍavetaṇḍaśuṇḍākāṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ vitanvan yudhi dhutajaḍimā hiṇḍate maṇḍalāgraḥ || 11 ||

div.p: ḍim iti || asya maṇḍalāgro hiṇḍata itas tato gacchati | kiṃvidhaḥ | daṇḍāydhasya yamasya ḍimbhaḥ śiśuḥ | ‘potaḥ pāko 'rbhako ḍimbhaḥ’ ity amaraḥ | pradhanam eva saṃgrāma eva ghanataḍit tasyāś caṇḍador hastaḥ kuṇḍalīndraḥ śeṣas tat kṣveḍo garalam | ‘kṣveḍas tu garalaṃ viṣam’ ity amaraḥ | proddaṇḍo darpo yeṣāṃ te ye dviradanā gajās teṣāṃ nigaḍo 'ndukaḥ | śauryabhartur ḍiṇḍimaḥ sūcakavādyaviśeṣaḥ | pracaṇḍasya bhāvas tathā, tadbhāṇḍam adhikaraṇam | punaḥ kiṃvidhaḥ | yudhi saṃgrāme dhṛtā madhupā yais tair galantaḥ sravanto gaṇḍā yeṣāṃ te evaṃvidhā vetaṇḍā gajās teṣāṃ śuṇḍās tāsāṃ kāṇḍaṃ samūhaṃ khaṇḍaṃ chedaṃ vitanvan vistārayan | dhuto jaḍimā yena saḥ ||

lg.l:
ḍhakkāsvārūḍhakīrtiprasṛtisuvijayaśrīvivoḍhā nirūḍho
vāḍhaṃ soḍhātigāḍhapraharaṇasamitau līḍhakoṣṇāstrasīdhuḥ |

rīḍhā gūḍhaprahartur draḍhimakulagṛhaṃ nyastaśastreṣu ṣaṇḍho
nirvyūḍhodgāḍhayuddhapratihatiṣu dṛḍhaṃ ḍhaukate 'muṣya khaḍgaḥ || 12 ||

div.p: ḍheti || amuṣya khaḍgo nirvyūḍhodgāḍhayuddhā vīrās teṣāṃ pratihatayo vraṇās tāsu dṛḍhaṃ ḍhaukate pravartate | kiṃvidhaḥ | ḍhakkayā vijayamardalena suṣṭu ārūḍhā yā kīrtis tasyāḥ prasṛtiḥ prasaras tasyāṃ suvijayaśrīs tasyā vivoḍhā | nirūḍhaḥ khyātaḥ | atigāḍhapraharaṇā yā samitiḥ saṃgrāmas tatra vāḍhaṃ soḍhā sahanaśīlaḥ | punaḥ kiṃvidhaḥ | līḍham āsvāditaṃ koṣṇaṃ kiṃcid uṣṇaṃ yad astraṃ tad eva sīdhur madyaṃ yena | gūḍhaprahartur aprakaṭamāraṇakartū rīḍhāvamānanā | draḍhimnaḥ kulagṛhaṃ dṛḍhatāyā adhiṣṭhānam | nyastaśastreṣu tyaktāyudheṣu ṣaṇḍho niḥsāraḥ ||

lg.l:
prāṇā darpasya pāṇī raṇaśamanaśiśoḥ kārmaṇaṃ dveṣaṇānāṃ
tūrṇaṃ sadvārabāṇavraṇakaraṇakṛtī kīrṇadurmarṣaṇārciḥ |

koṣṇadviṭśoṇitāktaḥ kharakiraṇaghṛṇiśreṇiśāṇo 'ruṇaśrīr
udgūrṇo vāraṇānāṃ gaṇam asṛṇi śṛṇāty asya tīkṣṇaḥ kṛpāṇaḥ || 13 ||

div.p: prāṇā iti || asya tīkṣṇaḥ kṛpāṇo vāraṇānāṃ gajānāṃ gaṇaṃ samūham asṛṇi sṛṇirahitaṃ yathātathā śṛṇāti | śṝ hiṃsāyām | mārayatīty arthaḥ | kiṃvidhaḥ darpasya balasya prāṇāḥ | bahutvena nirdeśaḥ | raṇa eva śamanaśiśus tasya pāṇir hastaḥ | pāṇī raṇeti ‘ro rī’ iti ‘ḍhralope’ iti dīrghaḥ | dveṣaṇānāṃ śatrūṇām | ‘dviṣaddveṣaṇadurhṛdaḥ’ ity amaraḥ | kārmaṇaṃ mūlakarma | tūrṇaṃ śīghraṃ sad yad vārabāṇaṃ kavacaṃ | ‘kañcuko 'strīvārabāṇaḥ’ ity amaraḥ | tatra vraṇakaraṇaṃ tatra kuśalaḥ | kīrṇaṃ prasāritaṃ durmarṣaṇaṃ duḥsaham arcir yena | koṣṇaṃ yad dviṣatāṃ śoṇitaṃ raktaṃ tenāktaḥ siktaḥ | kharakiraṇaḥ śrīsūryas tasya ghṛṇayo mayūkhās teṣāṃ śreṇis tasyāḥ śāṇo gharṣanapāṣāṇaḥ | aruṇā śrīr yasya saḥ | udgūrṇa utthāpitaḥ ||

lg.l: tṛpyaddantikṣitīndraṃ taralatarataratpattibhaṅgaṃ vighūrṇattuṅgāśvāvartagartaṃ niśitatamamilatkuntasaṃtānacakram |

tvaṅgattīkṣṇāsitūrvattimim anatidalacchaktiśuktiṃ raṇābdhiṃ
tāras tūrṇaṃ titīrṣus tṛṇalavavad arīn asya khaḍgas tṛṇeḍhi || 14 ||

div.p: tṛpyad iti || asya khaḍgo 'rīñ śatrūṃs tṛnalavavat tṛṇeḍhi | mārayatīty arthaḥ | ‘tṛha hiṃsāyām’ | kiṃvidhaḥ | tūrṇaṃ śīghraṃ raṇābdhiṃ saṃgrāmasamudraṃ titīrṣus taraṇecchuḥ | ‘tṝ plavanataraṇayoḥ’ | tāra ujjvalaḥ | kiṃvidhaḥ raṇābdhiṃ | tṛpyanto dantina eva kṣitīndrāḥ parvato yasmiṃs tathā tam | taralatarā aticañcalās taranto ye pattayaḥ padātayas ta eva bhaṅgās taraṅgā yasmiṃs tam | vighūrṇantas tuṅgā ye 'śvās ta evāvartagartā yasmiṃs tam | … … … … | tvaṅgantas tīkṣṇā ye 'sayas ta eva tūrvattimayo yasminn iti tathā tam | anatidalacchaktaya eva śuktayo yasmiṃs tam ||

lg.l:
sthūlaṃ sthūlaṃ śvasadbhiḥ prathitapṛthupṛṣadvīkṣaṇais tīrthamātraṃ
saṃmanvānair apārthaṃ śithilaraṇakathair vepathuvyarthaśastraiḥ |

saṃprāptaiḥ sthāṇusaṃsthāṃ prathitapathacarais trastanetrātithitvaṃ
nītaḥ pratyarthisārthair vyathayati savidhasthān apīddho 'sya khaḍgaḥ || 15 ||

div.p: sthūlam iti || asyeddhaḥ samṛddhaḥ khaḍgaḥ savidhasthān api samīpavartino 'pi vyathayati | kiṃvidhaḥ | pratyarthisārthaiḥ paripanthisamūhais trastāni yāni netrāṇi tatrātithitvaṃ nītaḥ | dṛṣṭa iti yāvat | kiṃvidhaiḥ pratyarthisārthaiḥ | sthūlaṃ sthūlaṃ dīrghaṃ dīrghaṃ śvasadbhiḥ | asahyatvāt | prathitapṛthu pṛṣanto bindavas tadyuktāni vīkṣaṇāni yeṣāṃ taiḥ | tīrthamātraṃ saṃmanvānaiḥ | apārthaṃ nirarthakaṃ śithilā raṇakathā yeṣāṃ te tathā taiḥ | vepathunā kampena vyarthāni śastrāṇi yeṣāṃ te taiḥ | ata eva sthāṇusaṃsthāṃ saṃprāptaiḥ | prathito yaḥ panthās tatra carantīti carās taiḥ | mahāpathas tu maraṇam iti ||

lg.l: dṛpyaddoḥkālakūṭadrumataruṇadalaṃ darpadantāvalendradrāghīyodānalekhā daradalitadalendīvaradroṇidehaḥ |

dīvyannaidāghamadhyaṃdinadivasamaṇidyotaduṣprekṣyadīptir
dauḥsthityaṃ dīrghadīrghaṃ dadad arisudṛśāṃ dīpyate 'muṣya khaḍgaḥ || 16 ||

div.p: dṛpyad iti || amuṣya khaḍgo dīvyateThe commentator seems to have a different reading from the verse. krīḍate | kiṃvidhaḥ | dṛpyad yad dor bāhuḥ sa eva kālakūṭadrumo viṣatarus tasya taruṇadalaṃ navīnapatram | darpadantāvalendro hastīndras tasya drāghīyo dīrghā dānalekhā | daram īṣad dalitaṃ viśīrṇaṃ dalaṃ yasyaivaṃvidham indīvaraṃ tasya droṇir madhyabhāgas tadvad deho yasya sa tathā | śyāma iti yāvat | dīvyad yan naidāghamadhyaṃdinam uṣṇakālamadhyāhnaṃ tatra yo divasamaṇis tasya dyotaḥ prakāśas tena duṣprekṣyā dīptir yasya saḥ | arisudṛśāṃ vairistrīṇāṃ dīrghadīrgham atimahad dauḥsthyaṃ duḥsthasya bhāvas tathā tad dadat ||

lg.l:
dhairyasyādhārayaṣṭir dhṛtaviṣudhavadhūsādhvaso dhāma dhāmnāṃ
dhūmaḥ krodhānalasya pradhanarathavarasyoddhuro dhūrdharo 'yam |

dhīrodāttor dhvavāhā dharaṇidharadhṛtas tīkṣṇadhārādharo 'ddhā
dhīrān auddhatyabhājo raṇadharaṇicarānasya dhūnoti khaḍgaḥ || 17 ||

div.p: dhairyasyeti || asyāyaṃ khaḍga auddhatyabhājo raṇadharaṇicarān saṃgrāmabhūmigatān dhīrān dhūnoti kampayati | kiṃvidhaḥ | dhairyasya guṇasyādhārayaṣṭiḥ | dhṛtaṃ viṣudhavadhūnāṃ devastrīṇāṃ sādhvasaṃ yena saḥ | dhāmnāṃ tejasāṃ dhāmādhiṣṭhānam | krodha evānalas tasya dhūmaḥ | pradhanaṃ saṃgrāmas tad eva rathavaras tasyoddhuro dhūrdharo bhāradhartā | dhīrodāttaḥ puruṣaśreṣṭhas tasyordhvavāhā hastaḥ | ‘bhujā vāhā’ iti strītvena nirdeśaḥ | dhīrodāttalakṣaṇaṃ rasakalikāyām ― ‘caturdhā puruṣaḥ ― dhīrodātto dhīralalito dhīraśānto dhīroddhataś ceti | tatra ― kṛpāvān atigambhīro vinītaś cāvikatthanaḥ | dhīrodāttaḥ sa vijñeyo rāmo dāśarathir yathā ||’ iti | dharaṇidhareṇa rājñā dhṛtaḥ | tīkṣṇadhārādharaḥ | ‘addhā’ ity aṅgīkāro 'vyayam ||
